entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Periods of light snow beginning this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023
